alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:24PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Bennington and northeastern Windham Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dorset, or near Manchester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Londonderry, Manchester, Dorset, Manchester Center, Windham, Rockingham, Rupert, Peru, Beartown, Brockways Mills, Peru Town Center, Barnumville, Bartonsville, Freedleyville, Thompsonburg, Bromley Village, South Dorset, North Windham, East Dorset and North Rupert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
